column20: In touch with leaders - headway before last (usual 2 out) - led run-in - headed post - just held(op 15/8)

column5: The Prodrive Shopfitting Ltd Novices' Handicap Chase (Go North Forgive 'N Forget Series Qualifier)
column20: Disputed lead - pressed leader before 2nd - in touch with leaders before 3rd - outpaced after 3 out - rallied run-in - stayed on(op 10/3 tchd 5/2)

column5: The Prodrive Shopfitting Ltd Novices' Handicap Chase (Go North Forgive 'N Forget Series Qualifier)
column20: In touch with leaders - headway and pressed leader before 4th - disputed lead before 5th - headed run-in - soon weakened gradually(op 3/1)

column5: The Prodrive Shopfitting Ltd Novices' Handicap Chase (Go North Forgive 'N Forget Series Qualifier)
column20: Never better than midfield - not fluent 3 out (usual 4 out) - jumped left last (usual 2 out) - soon no chance(op 7/1 tchd 13/2 and tchd 8/1)

column5: The Prodrive Shopfitting Ltd Novices' Handicap Chase (Go North Forgive 'N Forget Series Qualifier)
column20: Led narrowly or disputed lead run-in - weakened run-in(op 66/1 tchd 33/1)

column5: The Prodrive Shopfitting Ltd Novices' Handicap Chase (Go North Forgive 'N Forget Series Qualifier)
column20: In rear - awkward jump 1st - slow jump 2nd - slow jump 3rd - pulled up before 4th (jockey said gelding jumped poorly)

column5: Lisa Margaret Turner Memorial Handicap Hurdle
column20: In touch with leaders - steady headway before 3 out - joined leader 2 out - ridden when led last - kept on well(op 2/1)

column5: Lisa Margaret Turner Memorial Handicap Hurdle
column20: Prominent behind clear leader - led after 3 out - joined 2 out - soon headed - not fluent last - no extra run-in(op 5/1 tchd 9/2 and tchd 6/1)

column5: Lisa Margaret Turner Memorial Handicap Hurdle
column20: Led - headed after 3 out - soon lost two places - rallied before 2 out - went third before last - kept on(op 16/1)

column5: Lisa Margaret Turner Memorial Handicap Hurdle
column20: Towards rear - not fluent 6th - steady headway before 3 out - pressed leaders on turn before 2 out - weakened after 2 out(op 5/2 tchd 2/1)

column5: Lisa Margaret Turner Memorial Handicap Hurdle
column20: Towards rear - brief headway before 4 out - weakened before 2 out(op 18/1 tchd 16/1)

column5: Lisa Margaret Turner Memorial Handicap Hurdle
column20: In touch with leaders - mistake 5th - dropped to rear before 4 out - pulled up before 3 out (jockey said mare lost her action; vet reported mare lost her left-hind shoe)(op 4/1 tchd 18/5)

column5: Merry Christmas From Fairlight Studios Open National Hunt Flat Race (Category 1 Elimination) (GBB)
column20: Took keen hold - in touch with leaders - headway over 2f out - led over 1f out - soon ridden - edged left inside final furlong - kept on well(op 9/4 tchd 13/8)

column5: Merry Christmas From Fairlight Studios Open National Hunt Flat Race (Category 1 Elimination) (GBB)
column20: Took keen hold - held up in rear - steady headway over 2f out - went second inside final furlong - no match for winner(op 4/6 tchd 4/5)
